Works great!!!  This will keep me bussy for hours. Thanks!!!

Run the angry Birds.exe
Run the patch.exe
copy/paste the included serial when asked for it when you first run the game.
Play.
Don't get much simpler.
I do get an "invalid command line" error when I try to run the updater, but I think I can live with it.  Thanx .BONE
